Name: bead
About the game: You need to deliver the ball to the exit. The red cube explodes and gives acceleration to the ball. The yellow cube accelerates the ball. The green cube slows the ball. The remaining objects are obstacles and stop the ball. ▪ 50 Levels ▪ 350 Achievements
